products.title: Lana Mineral 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their beautiful lana range really creates that wow factor for an affordable price and is available in a range of on-trend colours with an attractive pattern. This blue vertical blind is perfect to add a stylish splash of colour to your room whilst also creating a cool hue. products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 200mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open and close the blind, beaded chain to tilt louvres.
